entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 8 except plus 5 along parts of the coast.
